name: Simple Video Gallery
author: MindoMobile

sections.description:
Simple Video Gallery (SVG) is easy to use plugin that allows adding videos and playlists (series of videos) into your blog page or post. Currently SVG supports only youtube.com videos with other services to be supported upon request. Plugin has built in stylesheet editor and therefore it should be quite simple to adapt the looks you desire.

You can help us to improve Simple Video Gallery plugin by suggesting new features or report existing bugs here. We appreciate any help!

Become our Facebook fan to keep up with the latest updates. You can also find us on Google+ circles here.

ENJOY!

Translations Credits
Serbo/Croatian – Borisa Djuraskovic
sections.installation:
There are 2 ways to install Simple Video Gallery on your blog:

Upload the plugin to your blog plugin directory using ftp client or web file manager and activate it or;

Visit your blog admin panel and:

  1. Click Plugins in the menu
  2. Click Add New
  3. In search field type “simple video gallery” (without quotes)
  4. Choose the Simple Video Gallery in the list and click Install Now.
sections.faq:
I have some troubles with plugin what should I do?

You can contact us by email support@mindomobile.com or you can leave us a message in contact form http://mindomobile.com/contact-us/.

I prepared the translations for the Simple Video Gallery. How I can upload it?

You can simply send the translation files to our email support@mindomobile.com and we would pack it within the next release of the plugin. Please, do not forget to include *.po and *.mo files as well as your WordPress username for credits!
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • New: Serbo/Croatian language added. Thanks goes to Borisa Djuraskovic.

1.0.0

  • New: Initial release
